name: Project Helion
description:
After a century long war between the Interstellar Federation and the Helion system, the federation is pushed back further and further by the enemies' robotic warmachines and drone armies. In this action sci-fi top-down shooter, you play a federation tank pilot, sent back to the original battlefield of the planet Helion to take out a vital generator to end the war once end for all.

Controls: Mouse and Keyboard recommended

Mouse and Keyboard: Move: WASD

Rotate: Mouse

Shoot Main Weapon: Left Mouse Button

Shoot Secondary Weapons: Right Mouse Button

Interact: F

Toggle Shield: Q

Dodge: Spacebar

Activate Heal: E

Zoom: Mouse Wheel

Controller:

Move: Left Thumbstick

Rotate: RightThumbstick

Shoot Main Weapon: Right Trigger

Shoot Secondary Weapons: Left Trigger

Interact: Bottom Face Button

Toggle Shield: Left Face Button

Dodge: Right Face Button

Activate Heal: Top Face Buton

Zoom Out: Left Shoulder

Zoom IN: RIght Shoulder
